short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of Izuku Midoriya from My Hero Academia with this Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Izuku Midoriya from My Hero Academia with this Chrome extension, featuring dynamic live wallpapers that capture the essence of his heroic journey. Watch as Midoriya's determination and growth shine through every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🎨 High-quality live wallpapers of Izuku Midoriya from My Hero Academia.
🌐 Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display for a functional yet stylish browsing experience.
🔗 Easy-to-manage shortcuts for quick navigation.
Embrace the courage and drive of Izuku Midoriya every time you open your browser, making this extension perfect for My Hero Academia fans.

More extensions: https://haberikra.com/

Privacy policy: https://haberikra.com/privacy-policy/
